summary: RentIQ Udaipur - a web app with Internet Identity authentication that requires admin approval for new users to access the system
architectural_notes: Internet Identity authentication with blank screen rendering issue on id.ai/#authorize
Admin approval system required for new user access
Two deployment links: production (rentiq-udaipur.com) and admin (rentiq-udaipur-x18.caffeine.xyz)
known_issues: Internet Identity authorization page shows blank white screen instead of login interface with passkey/Google/Apple/Microsoft options

existing_features.title: Debug and fix the Internet Identity authorization page (id.ai/#authorize) that currently displays a blank white screen instead of the login interface with passkey/Google/Apple/Microsoft options
Verify the Internet Identity component initialization and ensure the authentication flow properly displays in iframe/popup/window mode
Ensure the Internet Identity authentication integration works correctly in both admin mode (rentiq-udaipur-x18.caffeine.xyz) and production mode (rentiq-udaipur.com)
